name: Reolink Argus 3 Wireless Outdoor Camera
description:
Reolink Argus 3 is a wireless, rechargable camera that c onnnects via WiFi to your phone allowing you to monitor over desired area.

It can be installed on any surface without the need for drilling. Reolink Argus 3 also containts a reflector which allow for better movement detection during night-time.

Although it contains a rechargeable battery, a solar panel will charge the camera if placed outside. The camera can be controlled either through your phone or via voice recognition to provide you the best experience.
